titles.title: Patient Access to ESRD New Innovative Devices Act
Patient Access to ESRD New Innovative Devices Act

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve access to innovative new medical devices furnished to individuals with end stage renal disease under part B of the Medicare program by establishing a new device add-on payment adjustment under such part.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Patient Access to ESRD New Innovative Devices Act
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) to establish a process to provide a certain payment adjustment under the Medicare end-stage renal disease (ESRD) prospective payment system. Specifically, the CMS must establish a process to provide for a temporary add-on payment adjustment for new medical devices used to diagnose, treat, or manage ESRD.
